pages.text: Sometimes you want to use a material when building, but obtaining it in sufficient quantities is out of reach. In this case, why not fake it 'til you make it? No-one will know you're actually using $(item)Construction Paste$() instead of real diamonds in that giant ode to manhood.$(br)This paste can be used in place of any block when building with a $(l:useful_things/building_tools/building_tome)$(item)Tome of Building$(), $(l:useful_things/building_tools/exchanging_tome)$(item)Exchanging$() or $(l:useful_things/building_tools/transferrence_tome)$(item)Transferrence$().

pages.title: Construction Powder
pages.text: Place $(item)Construction Powder$() next to water and break it once hardened, or throw in a cauldron of water to get $(item)Construction Paste$().
